objects.text:
• Plush memory foam ear cushions
   for extended comfort
• Professional-grade audio drivers
   for superior sound quality
• Noise-isolating ear cups for
   immersive listening experience

product_details.name: Premium Comfort Over-Ear Headphones - Studio Quality Sound Experience
product_details.description:
• Plush memory foam ear cushions for extended comfort
• Professional-grade audio drivers for superior sound quality
• Adjustable padded headband for custom fit
• Durable wired connection for reliable performance
• Sleek matte black design with modern aesthetics
• Foldable design for easy storage and portability
• Deep bass response and clear mids and highs
• Noise-isolating ear cups for immersive listening
• Lightweight yet sturdy construction
• Universal compatibility with 3.5mm audio jack

banner_details:
This banner features a promotional layout with a modern tech aesthetic, ideal for showcasing audio products. The left side is dedicated to textual content layered vertically, while the right side highlights a realistic product image of headphones. The gradient background blends deep indigo (#1A1A2E) with violet tones (#4A266A), transitioning into a semi-transparent dark overlay for visual separation.

The banner includes the following key text layers: a bold promotional heading ("heading_1" and "heading_2"), a striking subheader for product positioning ("subheading"), bulleted product features ("description"), a prominent price tag in futuristic style ("price"), a short promotional tagline ("tagline"), and a bright call-to-action button ("cta") over a golden yellow rectangle ("cta_background").

Decorative elements like circular gradients and small golden crosses add a festive, eye-catching punch. The large headphone "product_image" is placed prominently on the right with realistic shadowing, overlapping slightly for depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Indigo: #1A1A2E
- Violet Purple: #4A266A
- Bright Yellow/Gold: #FFD700
- White: #FFFFFF
- Near Black (Overlay): #262626 (30% opacity)
product_color: The product image shows a sleek pair of over-ear headphones designed in a modern, professional style. The color palette is monochromatic, with dominant shades of dark gray and black. Key colors include matte black (#1C1C1C), charcoal gray (#3A3A3A), and metallic graphite (#4B4B4B). These colors are seamlessly blended to highlight different textures—matte on the plastic frame, soft glossy on ear cushions, and a subtle metallic sheen on the sides. This interplay creates contrast without using bright tones, making it ideal for tech-savvy, modern ad banners. A clean background with accent tones like electric blue (#007BFF) or neon green (#39FF14) can add vibrancy.
